custom.name: Weather Forecast App
custom.shortDescription: A React application that provides weather forecasts based on city names. It fetches weather data using the Open-Meteo API and geocodes locations with the Geocode Maps API. The app is deployed with GitHub Pages.

custom.name: Task Manager
custom.shortDescription: A simple Electron-based task manager application with a custom menu bar, modal dialogs, and task management features. Built with Electron, it offers task creation, priority setting, and due date management.

custom.name: Snake
custom.shortDescription: A little snake thing. Still experimental, but I guess it could last longer.

custom.name: Calculator App
custom.shortDescription: One of the projects I started but could not finish (thanks to the front-end :LOL:).
